problem.markdown:
You have four CSV files that are located in the same folder. All four of the CSV files have the same file structure.
>>What is the minimum number of queries you need to create to import three of the CSV files?<<
(x) One ( ) Two ( ) Three ( ) Four
[explanation] You can import multiple CSV files that are located in the same folder and have the same file structure in a single query. [explanation]
problem.p: You have four CSV files that are located in the same folder. All four of the CSV files have the same file structure.
What is the minimum number of queries you need to create to import three of the CSV files?

choicegroup.label: What is the minimum number of queries you need to create to import three of the CSV files?

div.p: You can import multiple CSV files that are located in the same folder and have the same file structure in a single query.
